meanings.definition: A person born in the US or Canada whose parents were immigrants from Japan.
meanings.sent1: My friend's grandparents came from Japan, making him a nisei.
meanings.sent2: The nisei in our community celebrate their Japanese heritage.
meanings.sent3: The nisei at the sushi restaurant always make the best rolls.
meanings.sent4: The nisei of the family tree bridge the gap between two cultures.
meanings.sent5: The nisei proudly carry on their ancestors' traditions.

meanings.definition: The second generation of Japanese immigrants in North America.
meanings.sent1: Many nisei families have deep roots in the local community.
meanings.sent2: The nisei often share stories of their parents' journey to America.
meanings.sent3: The nisei siblings always compete in the annual Japanese festival.
meanings.sent4: The nisei generation continues to honor their cultural heritage.
meanings.sent5: The nisei bring a blend of Japanese and American influences to their art.
